abstract: All relevant ethical guidelines have been followed; any necessary IRB and/or ethics committee approvals have been obtained and details of the IRB/oversight body are included in the manuscript.
author: Laurent Petit; Cedric Carrie; Olivier Joannes-boyau; Benjamin Clouzeau; Antoine Garric; Christian Combe; Antoine Dewitte; Charline Sazio; Sebastien RUBIN; Olivier Guisset; Hadrien Roze; Frederic Vargas; Catherine Fleureau; Sandrine Dabernat; Gaelle Mourissoux; Arthur Orieux; Fabrice Camou; Nahema Issa; Marie-Lise Bats; Claire Rigothier; Odile Pillet; Renaud Prevel; Didier Gruson; Hoang-Nam Bui; Alexandre Boyer
title: Characterisation of Acute Kidney Injury in Critically Ill Patients with Severe Coronavirus Disease-2019 (COVID-19)
